page.title: 19WHALTON VILLAGE HALL
page.content: The Village Hall, built 63 years ago, is a focal point for local activities. It is run by a committee of some 18 people who organise fund_raising events to provide finance for the up_ keep of the building. The cottage attached to the hall is also owned and maintained by "The Village Hall" who employ and house a caretaker there. A representative from each of the clubs using the hall regularly serve on the committee. The regular users are as follows: Monday: Old Folks Association Whist Tuesday: Old Folks Luncheon Club Badminton Club Thursday: Women's Institute The hall is also used on occasion by the church,Young Farmers, Border Terrier Club and for dances, parties etc. both private and as fund-raising events for local charities, etc.
